name: KJ Somaiya
description: Liberates from poverty, from hunger. Also to liberate one from the attachments that bind us to small-mindedness. Knowledge also provides opportunity. To make the life lived more meaningful. In the service of one’s family, one’s community, one’s समाज, country, and indeed the world. Bearing in mind that there is no religion other that the life lived in service of humanity, न मानुषात् परो धर्म:। We will strive to provide access and opportunity to build a more inclusive society.
features: Provide a well-rounded liberal arts education with a concentration in either the sciences, the humanities or the professions
Provide services to the communities by increasing their ability to make practical application of knowledge
Encourage optimum physical development & the safeguarding of health
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: KNOWLEDGE ALONE LIBERATES
ShortDescription: K J Somaiya Institute of Management (formerly K J Somaiya Institute of Management Studies & Research) was established in 1981 as a part of Somaiya Vidyavihar (now a constituent institute of the Somaiya Vidyavihar University since August 2019) with the objective of providing state of the art education in management and allied areas.

Highlights.name: Variety of Ph.D. Programs
Highlights.description: The institute offers Ph.D programs in various fields related to business management, including Business Analytics, Data Science and Technology, Economics, Finance and Banking, and more.

Highlights.name: AACSB Accreditation
Highlights.description: The institute is accredited by AACSB, a prestigious accreditation body for business schools. This signifies the high quality of their educational programs.

Highlights.name: Established Institution:
Highlights.description: : Founded in 1981, K J Somaiya Institute of Management has a long history of providing management education.

enhanced_description: K J Somaiya Institute of Management, established in 1981, is a long-standing academic institution accredited by AACSB for its high-quality management education. Positioned as a Learning and Development solution for businesses, it aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, supporting continuous learning. The institute provides a comprehensive education in management and allied areas, including advanced Ph.D. programs, with a focus on practical application of knowledge, serving as a corporate learning management solution.
target_industries: All industries seeking to enhance their workforce's management and allied skills through structured learning programs
key_use_cases: Providing corporate management education and training for employees
Accelerating workforce skill development and learning efficiency
Facilitating continuous learning initiatives for employees
Supporting advanced professional development through Ph.D. programs in business management fields
Delivering customized learning content for corporate needs (implied by 'Course authoring' sub-category)
competitive_advantages: AACSB Accreditation, signifying high quality educational programs
Established institution with a long history (founded in 1981)
Offers a variety of Ph.D. programs in business management fields
Focus on practical application of knowledge
Provides state-of-the-art education in management and allied areas
roi_benefits: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Increased ability for practical application of knowledge
primary_users: Employees seeking management and allied education
